a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD5DTMeaslesCILogic (IMMZ.D5.DT.Measles contraindications) * Rule: Check for contraindications before administering the vaccine(s) due * Decision Table: IMMZ.D5.DT.Measles contraindications * Trigger: IMMZ.D5 Determine vaccine(s) to be administered based on contraindications */ library IMMZD5DTMeaslesCILogic

a:t.value: Draft Medication Request ID for MCV dose

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Do not vaccinate client with measles as measles vaccination is contraindicated for pregnant client.

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Do not vaccinate client with measles as measles vaccination is contraindicated for severely immunosuppressed client.

a:s.a:s: 'Do not vaccinate client with measles as measles vaccination is contraindicated for pregnant client.'
'Do not vaccinate client with measles as measles vaccination is contraindicated for severely immunosuppressed client.'

then.value: Do not vaccinate client with measles as measles vaccination is contraindicated for pregnant client.
Do not vaccinate client with measles as measles vaccination is contraindicated for severely immunosuppressed client.

def.name: Measles vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement required. Create a clinical note

a:s.a:s: "The client has history of anaphylactic reactions"

def.name: Measles vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement required. Create a clinical note Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Measles vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement required. Create a clinical note Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Do not vaccinate client with measles if client has history of anaphylactic reaction to any component of the vaccine (e.g. neomycin or gelatin).

a:s.a:s: 'Do not vaccinate client with measles if client has history of anaphylactic reaction to any component of the vaccine (e.g. neomycin or gelatin).'

expression.value: Do not vaccinate client with measles if client has history of anaphylactic reaction to any component of the vaccine (e.g. neomycin or gelatin).

def.name: Clinical judgement required. Create a clinical note

a:t.value: Clinical judgement required. Create a clinical note

def.name: Clinical judgement required. Create a clinical note Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Clinical judgement required. Create a clinical note Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Do not vaccinate client with measles if client has history of severe allergic reactions to any component of the vaccine (e.g. neomycin or gelatin).

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Client has symptomatic HIV infection. Measles vaccination may be considered if the client is not severely immunosuppressed according to conventional definitions, consider risks of vaccination and make a clinical judgement.
